ABOUT.ME_TEXT:
I'm a frontend and backend Developer from Graz, Austria. Currently I am doing an internship at {{ text }}.

After some coding sessions I love to drive with my motorbike and take some macro or landscape pictures of the nature.
ABOUT.QUOTE: Traveling is the way you learn the most

CODE_TEXT: I love well structured and reusable code, but that just work with a lot of pizza! Human make mistakes therefore I use buildtools to check the quality of the code. Continuous Integration and testing are a big part of my projects.
INTEREST_TEXT: Learning new stuff is one of the most interesting things for me. New technologies, cooking methods, people or places. Everything has something special where I can learn something new.
